post.description: Survey participant login with email and password.

captcha.description: Captcha token if enabled on system and survey level

post.description: Survey participant login with alias and password.

captcha.description: Captcha token if enabled on system and survey level

post.description: Survey participant login with unique URL token.

captcha.description: Captcha token if enabled on system and survey level

post.description: Refresh access token using refresh token. API server expects refresh token sent as cookie. Cookie name can differ based on API server configuration.
Clears cookie which stores refresh token and revokes refresh token.

get.description: Fetch list of available languages for front-ends.
Get language entry and available translations.

post.description: Request a password reset token to be sent by email. If captcha-protection activated, a captcha token has to be sent to validate the request.

captcha.description: Captcha token if enabled on system level

post.description: Reset password using a token sent by email.

get.description: Publicly accessible survey list. Returns list of public surveys.
Returns survey parameters necessary to render the survey login page such as the language settings and the support e-mail.

post.description: Generate user for survey public survey. Automatically create a new user account with a respondent role and random credentials if allowed by the survey settings.

captcha.description: Captcha token if enabled on system level

post.description: Create user for survey survey using JWT encoded parameters. Payload must be a valid JWT token signed with secret set up in survey settings.

get.description: Get reference data for feedback.
Get the list of root categories & foods for the "browse all foods" options.
Get the category contents, i.e. foods and subcategories listed under the given category.
Browse and search category contents for foods and subcategories listed under the given category.
Returns a list of foods from the food database that match the description.
Get portion size estimation options, associated foods and related data for a food from the database.
Get the recipe food data for a food if any.
Get the list of categories for a food.

post.description: Subscribe user to receive web-push notifications. It expects the subscription object produced by Web API PushManager

delete.description: Unsubscribe user from receiving web-push notifications.

post.description: Send test push notification to user.

get.description: Download feedback as PDF. Returns stream as application/pdf.

post.description: Email user feedback as PDF file attachment

get.description: Get user physical data for feedback and survey recall calculations.

post.description: Set user physical data for feedback and survey recall calculations.

get.description: Get user submissions for selected surveys.
Get as served image definitions for the given as served sets.
Get as served image definitions for the given as served set.
Get the definition of "sliding scale" which is the portion size estimation for hot and cold drinks.
Get the definition of "sliding scale" which is the portion size estimation for hot and cold drinks.
Get definition of an image map which is an image of multiple objects from which one can be selected. Every object has an associated weight that is used for portion size weight calculations.
Get definition of an image map which is an image of multiple objects from which one can be selected. Every object has an associated weight that is used for portion size weight calculations.

Returns an image map definition similar to guide images, but without the associated weights. Used for selecting objects from images where the object is not directly associated with a weight, e.g. selecting pizza slice sizes whose final weight also depends on pizza thickness and type.

Returns an image map definition similar to guide images, but without the associated weights. Used for selecting objects from images where the object is not directly associated with a weight, e.g. selecting pizza slice sizes whose final weight also depends on pizza thickness and type.
Get definitions for the given standard units.
Get definitions for the given standard units.
Dummy endpoint for manual weight entry estimation method. The method has no parameters and this request is needed to get the image URL for the portion size option selection screen.
Returns survey parameters such as the scheme ID, current status, custom HTML content etc.
Returns a subset of personal data for the current user that is relevant to the recall application.

maximumTotalSubmissionsReached.description: Whether the user has reached the maximum number of submissions

maximumDailySubmissionsReached.description: Whether the user has reached the maximum number of submissions per day

followUpUrl.description: Optional follow-up URL for user redirect

get.description: Get survey user session (current recall state), if any. Functionality is controlled by survey settings.

post.description: Save survey user session (current recall state) on server. Functionality is controlled by survey settings.

delete.description: Clear survey user session (current recall state) on server. Functionality is controlled by survey settings.

post.description: Notify people having survey support role or survey support email to give the respondent a call to help them complete their recall.
Submit 5-start rating about the survey recall experience.
Submit recall data to the server.

maximumTotalSubmissionsReached.description: Whether the user has reached the maximum number of submissions

maximumDailySubmissionsReached.description: Whether the user has reached the maximum number of submissions per day

followUpUrl.description: Optional follow-up URL for user redirect
